resources.string: Enables dark mode throughout the app to reduce eye strain.
Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history

How to play Songle: 

Walk around The edinburgh university campus and collect lyrics to popular songs as you get near enough to the markers displayed on the map. You can see the lyrics you have already collected by clicking the basket icon above the map, and you can guess the song by clicking guess at the top of the collected words screen.

The You can see your progress at any time from the map by clicking the hamburger icon at the top right of the screen, this will display the menu and at the top you can see some statistics about how far you have walked. For more detailed information, click on the arrow to the right of these statistics.
Save your eyes at night with a darker theme

No, we will not let you go. (Let him go!) 49 Bismillah! We will not let you go. (Let him go!) 50 Bismillah! We will not let you go. (Let me go!) 51 Will not let you go. (Let me go!) 52 Never, never let you go 53 Never let me go, oh. 54 No, no, no, no, no, no, no. 55 Oh, mama mia, mama mia (Mama mia, let me go.) 56 Beelzebub has a devil put aside for me, for me, for me. 57 58 So you think you can stone me and spit in my eye? 59 So you think you can love me and leave me to die? 60 Oh, baby, can't do this to me, baby, 61 Just gotta get out, just gotta get right outta here. 62 63 (Ooooh, ooh yeah, ooh yeah) 64 65 Nothing really matters, 66 Anyone can see, 67 Nothing really matters, 68 Nothing really matters to me. 69 70 Any way the wind blows.
